scripts.start: cross-env ENV=production MAX_WORKERS=2 CLUSTER_INSTANCES=1 npm run pm2-puppeteer-ssr
scripts.build: npx vue-tsc && cross-env ENV=production cross-env MODE=production vite build
scripts.build:esm: npx vue-tsc && cross-env ESM=true cross-env ENV=production cross-env MODE=production vite build
scripts.start-dev: cross-env MAX_WORKERS=4 node -r sucrase/register server/src/index.ts & vite
scripts.start-preview: cross-env ENV=production CLUSTER_INSTANCES=2 MAX_WORKERS=7 npm run pm2-puppeteer-ssr & vite preview
scripts.start-puppeteer-ssr: cross-env PUPPETEER_SSR_PORT=8080 npx pm2 -i 1 --silent start npm --name "start-puppeteer-ssr" -- run pm2-puppeteer-ssr
scripts.format: npm run prettier:fix && npm run lint:fix
scripts.pre-commit: npm run server-build && git add ./server/dist & npx vue-tsc && lint-staged
scripts.prepare: git config core.autocrlf false && npx husky install

lint-staged.*.{vue,js,jsx,ts,tsx}: npm run prettier:fix && npm run lint
